attributes.action: Stop all passenger aircraft from Spain, Italy and Iran from landing in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Spain, Italy and Iran are currently at the epicentre of the pandemic. The US and many other countries have stopped all flights from Europe. We should do the same, targeting those countries where the mortality rate is at its highest.
attributes.background: Help prevent the arrival of people flying to the UK from Spain, Italy, and Iran as we do not have the necessary quarantine facilities to prevent them from infecting people in this country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
